title: Thoosa 2
para1: Thoosa is a competency management package developed by a small team of two software developers: Poseidon Software Solutions Ltd. In the summer of 2019, I was brought on as the sole front-end developer for the web iteration of their project 'Thoosa 2'. Although my responsibilties mostly involved client-side design and development; I also helped out with the database and back-end design as well.
para2: Designed to assist organisations in keeping track of their staff competencies, the Thoosa 2 web interface is built to be equal parts intuitive and powerful. It is designed to look and feel like a native application desite running in a web client.
